name: Beach Ball Simulator
description:
Created for the Mini-game jam #93 https://itch.io/jam/mini-jam-93-vacation

Guide the beach ball back to the beach as fast as you can! Watch out for the ice cream truck who will not be stopping for a simple beach ball. Try it once, try it many times, just have fun with it!

It was pretty difficult thinking about how to implement the limitation of "indirect control", here's what I ended up with.

---------------------------------------------------
